channel.title: General Electric Company (R-033)

item.title: Lists change in telephone number for H Bernard,facility project manager,due to NRR reorganization.D Tondi new Nonpower Reactors & Safeguards Licensing Section leader. Correspondence should be sent to listed address.

item.title: Comment opposing proposed rules 10CFR170 & 171 re insp & annual fees for FY 1999.GE requests NRC reconsider application of proposed fee structure to VBWR,in possession only status with no spent fuel stored on-site.

item.title: Insp repts 50-070/99-201,50-073/99-201 & 50-183/99-201 on 990607-10.No violations noted.Major areas inspected: operation program,organizational structure & functions program.

item.title: PNO-V-88-038:on 880612,earthquake occurred on Calaveras Fault within 50 miles of identified facilities.All reactors shutdown at time of earthquake.No seismic trips observed. Insp revealed no signs of damage at facilities.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Informs of relocation of NRR to Rockville,MD.Official mailing address still remains same & project managers have new locations & phone numbers.TS Michaels still lead project manager for facility & A Adams will serve as backup.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO PUBLIC ENTITY/CITIZEN/ORGANIZATION/MEDIA, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: PNO-V-88-044:on 880627,earthquake occurred 5 miles east of Santa Cruz,CA.Seismic instrumentation not triggered at Vallecitos,Aerotest operations or at Univ of California at Berkeley.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS

item.title: Generic Ltr 80-38 to all nonpower reactor licensees re NPR physical protection requirements.Summary of certain NPR physical protection requirements encl & should aid in determining safeguards requirements applicable to facility.

item.title: Show cause order requiring that,upon completion of present operating cycle on 771027,GETR should be placed & maintained safely in cold shutdown condition.Comments for GETR 771202 meeting encl.

item.title: Advises that presence & irradiation of explosives in reactor must be evaluated due to potential for damage to reactor. Evaluation requested establishing operating restrictions,max quantity of explosives allowed in facility & form.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: US ATOMIC ENERGY COMMISSION (AEC)

item.title: Further response to FOIA requests for documents re Dow Chemical Co of Midland,MI.Forwards Apps H,I,J & K documents. Documents also available in PDR.Document I-10 partially withheld (ref FOIA Exemption 6).
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO PUBLIC ENTITY/CITIZEN/ORGANIZATION/MEDIA, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
